channel.title: Help with making shop
channel.description:
well i made a shop and it works fine but everytime i open the shop it disconnects me from server here is my code i run project 16
in shop.java [code] shop = 39 Weapon Dealer 2 2 4151 5 [/code]
in autospawn.cfg [code] //Shopping mall Weapon Merchant spawn=580 2961 3349 0 0 0 0 0 1 A weapon dealer [/code]
in client.java [code] else if (NPCID == 580) { //Flynn PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //Falador Mace Shop [/code]

item.title: Help with making shop
item.dc:creator: @foolofdoom foolofdoom
item.description:
@foolofdoom wrote:

well i made a shop and it works fine but everytime i open the shop it disconnects me from server here is my code
i run project 16

in shop.java

shop = 39	Weapon Dealer					2	2	4151	5

in autospawn.cfg

//Shopping mall
Weapon Merchant
spawn=580	2961	3349	0	0	0	0	0	1	A weapon dealer

in client.java

 else if (NPCID == 580) { //Flynn
					PutNPCCoords = true;
					WanneShop = 39; //Falador Mace Shop

Read full topic
